text.autoconfig.mainmenuchanger.title: Main Menu Changer config
text.autoconfig.mainmenuchanger.option.d: Removes Language and Accessibility buttons from the title screen.
text.autoconfig.mainmenuchanger.option.m: Make the Multiplayer and Singleplayer buttons be on the same line
modmenu.summaryTranslation.mainmenuchang: Configurable mod that lets you change how the Main Menu is laid out.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.mainmenuc: Configurable mod that lets you change how the Main Menu is laid out.
